basic_info.description: Most engineers debug errors. I debug chaos ..lol, real though. I’m Onyeibor Samuel, a fullstack developer who brings clarity to messy systems using Python, React, and cloud tech. I’ve built tools that power real lives, not just portfolios and I believe clean code is a form of respect: to users, to teammates, and to the future. I craft scalable software that feels simple, no matter how complex the backend. I don’t just solve problems.., I make them disappear. And while I’ve already shipped things that matter, I’m even more excited by what I haven’t learned yet. I'm currently advancing into my third year of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, hungry to grow, learning, and ready to earn my place, one commit at a time.

projects.title: TaskFlow
projects.description: A fullstack task and project management platform with AI-powered features. TaskFlow lets users create tasks with subtasks, set deadlines, track progress with charts, manage projects with role-based members, and interact via Kanban boards and discussions. It also includes AI-generated task breakdowns, user notifications, project upvotes, and flexible visibility controls (private/public). Built for scale and deployed on AWS.

projects.title: Contention
projects.description: Contention is an AI debate partner that argues, questions, and challenges not just to win, but to sharpen how you think. Built with a focus on critical thinking and perspective-switching, it supports multiple debate modes (casual, formal, devil’s advocate), customizable personalities, and real-time logic analysis. I designed it to be more than a chatbot, it’s a sparring partner for your brain.

projects.title: Plated
projects.description: Plated is a recipe and smart meal planning tool that helps users effortlessly organize their food life and browse recipes from daily meal scheduling to automated grocery list generation. I designed it to reduce decision fatigue, using AI to suggest meals based on preferences, nutrition goals, or just what’s left in your fridge. It’s like a personal meal assistant that plans, adapts, and simplifies what’s for dinner.
